# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and provide exceptional value. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. We're offering this remarkable product to you for $150, which includes not only its inherent value but also a special discount tailored for you. This is an opportunity to experience the best we have to offer at a competitive price. Please let us know if you're interested in taking advantage of this exclusive offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
